survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate customer satisfaction and identify areas for improvement in retail banking services.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your primary banking provider?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for measuring satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your primary banking provider?

questions.question_text: Which of the following banking services do you use regularly? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture service usage patterns.

script.question_text: Which of the following banking services do you use regularly? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How often do you visit a physical bank branch?
questions.client_notes: Use a frequency scale to measure branch visitation habits.

script.question_text: How often do you visit a physical bank branch?

questions.question_text: What is the primary reason you visit a physical bank branch?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Weekly', 'Monthly', 'Quarterly', or 'Once a year or less' to Q3
questions.client_notes: Only show to respondents who visit branches.

script.question_text: What is the primary reason you visit a physical bank branch?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Weekly', 'Monthly', 'Quarterly', or 'Once a year or less' to Q3

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your bank's mobile app?
answer_options: Not applicable (I don't use the mobile app)
questions.client_notes: Include an option for non-users to avoid skewing results.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your bank's mobile app?
answer_options: Not applicable (I don't use the mobile app)

questions.question_text: What features do you value most in your bank's mobile app? (Select up to 3)
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Very satisfied', 'Satisfied', 'Neutral', 'Dissatisfied', or 'Very dissatisfied' to Q5
questions.client_notes: Limit selections to prioritize top features.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (multi-choice) with max 3 selections.

script.question_text: What features do you value most in your bank's mobile app? (Select up to 3)
script.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Very satisfied', 'Satisfied', 'Neutral', 'Dissatisfied', or 'Very dissatisfied' to Q5

questions.question_text: How easy is it to resolve issues with your bank?
answer_options: Not applicable (I haven't had any issues)
questions.client_notes: Include an option for respondents without issues.

script.question_text: How easy is it to resolve issues with your bank?
answer_options: Not applicable (I haven't had any issues)

questions.question_text: What is your preferred method for contacting customer support?
questions.client_notes: Capture channel preferences for support interactions.

script.question_text: What is your preferred method for contacting customer support?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your bank to friends or family?
questions.client_notes: Use a standard Net Promoter Score (NPS) question format.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your bank to friends or family?

questions.question_text: What could your bank improve to better meet your needs?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: What could your bank improve to better meet your needs?
